title: The Unexpected Journey of Pit Simmons: Super Tutor

story.text: Pit Simmons discovered he could manipulate time while tutoring a struggling student in mathematics. He accidentally froze time, and the realization dawned on him as the clock stopped ticking but his student continued to learn.

Excited by his newfound powers, Pit experimented and found he could extend this ability to other areas. He stopped time to help an old lady cross the street safely, avoiding a near miss with a speeding car.

Pit decided to use his abilities more actively. While tutoring, he froze time to give his students extra time to grasp complex concepts without them realizing, significantly improving their performance.
Facing a moral dilemma, Pit wondered if altering time for such purposes was ethical. He spent a frozen moment in deep thought, realizing the responsibility that came with such power.
Pit's activities drew the attention of a mysterious group interested in harnessing his powers for gain. They approached him with an offer, promising wealth in exchange for his services.
Pit refused the offer, understanding that his powers should be used for genuine aid and not personal gain. He resumed his tutoring, using his abilities discreetly to help those in need.

Reflecting on the week, Pit decided to keep his powers a secret, fearing exploitation. He continued living a normal life by day and using his extraordinary abilities to make a quiet difference by night.

ending: Thus, Pit Simmons lived a double life, a tutor by day and a guardian of time by night.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility, and the true measure of a hero is how they choose to use it.
